SENT.plain: Radiofrequency, laser, microwave and cryotherapy have all been used for the ablation of lung tumours
However, radiofrequency ablation (RFA) and microwave ablation are the most widely used technologies
RFA has been successfully applied to tumour measuring from <3 to 3.5 cm, either primary or secondary
Lung function usually recovers to pre-ablation values following an initial reduction and the complication profile is well understood
